post.text: You don't want to miss this one: Join Hillary, President Obama, First Lady Michelle Obama, President Bill Clinton, and Chelsea Clinton live in Philly on the eve of Election Day.

comment.author: Sarah
comment.text: Listen to the crowd. Bored out of their minds. Hillary has such a low personal connection. She going to start screeching soon - just wait.

replies.author: Sarah
replies.text: I listen to the entire actual speeches of both sides. I don't let other people tell me what they said or tell me what to think. Try it some time.

replies.author: Katlyn
replies.text: What do you meant Sarah? She's hot and power .... love her , she will make a big difference in this precious USA .... low connection??? We are going high 💙💙💙💙💙💙👍🏽
